comments.body: I don't think it is, but just checking that the parasitic ec isn't used for the actual http request.
Decisively no :) Akka's own `Http().singleRequest` method doesn't even take a execution context as an (implicit) parameter. Thanks for keeping an eye on this!

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +86,90 @@    import BigQueryException._
    import SprayJsonSupport._
    implicit val ec = ExecutionContexts.parasitic
    val projectId = table.tableReference.projectId.getOrElse(settings.projectId)
    val datasetId = table.tableReference.datasetId
